Name: x_team_assigned_to_project
Description: Binary assignment of a team to a project

Name: x_story_assigned_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision whether a user story is in the sprint

Name: x_task_selected
Description: Binary selection of a task for implementation

Name: x_worker_assigned_to_task
Description: Binary assignment of a worker to a task

Name: x_feature_in_release
Description: Binary decision whether a feature is included in a release

Name: x_blocker_mark_resolved
Description: Binary decision to resolve/close a blocker

Name: y_sprint_capacity_sp
Description: Total sprint capacity in story points

Name: y_daily_scrum_duration_min
Description: Planned duration of the Daily Scrum in minutes

Name: y_planning_time_min
Description: Planned Sprint Planning time in minutes
